data.name: RegConfirmBody
data.value: We're happy to have you joining our community! Please confirm your registeration in order to activate your account to unlock all the features available.

data.name: AccountDeletionBody
data.value: We've received a request to delete your Solar Network account. We're sorry to see you go. To confirm your account deletion, please click the button below. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

data.name: AccountDeletionHint
data.value: If you did not request to delete your account, please ignore this email or contact our support team immediately.

data.name: PasswordResetHint
data.value: If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email safety.

data.name: ContactVerificationBody
data.value: Thank you for updating your contact method on the Solar Network. To ensure your account security, we need to verify this change. Please click the button below to verify your contact method:

data.name: ContactVerificationHint
data.value: If you didn't request this change, please contact our support team immediately.

data.name: CodeEmailBody
data.value: Someone trying to use email auth factor to authorize an access request. If that is you, enter the code below to continue.

data.name: CodeEmailHint
data.value: This code will expire in 30 minutes.

data.name: CodeEmailHintSecondary
data.value: If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email safely

data.name: AlternativeLinkHint
data.value: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste the following URL into your web browser:

data.name: PasswordResetBody
data.value: We recieved a request to reset your Solar Network account password. Click the button below to continue and reset it.
